text:
<@U5YCF9SCB> So thought i'd give you a bit of insight as to what i am doing on my own business today
So as i might have mentioned by business is called Tmup (pronounced Tee-mup), and is to help people find others to play sports with
At the moment the app is being built and should be ready in 4-6 weeks (fingers crossed) so at the moment i am trying to figure out who would be my first customers and how i go about finding them. Also, soon i will need to raise some money to fund further development, and so i am preparing a presentation to present to people who might want to invest (think dragon's den)
Then when i am at EY (my other job) i am working with a team of people to win some new business
So we are trying to understand what they will be looking for and how we can best target out business to help them
But enough about me!
Let's get on with your career plan!
Would it help if maybe we did it over a call at some point over the next few days on here?
We can then talk through the questions and fill it in together
What do you reckon?
